resources.string:
SwiftSMS helps you use your Webtexts straight from your phone or tablet in a fast and simple manner. It is designed to provide you easy and intuitive access to sending SMS messages using your Network Providers Webtext allowance. Features include: * Send SMS via Webtext * Multiple Accounts * Fast Account Switching * Simple and Quick Contact Suggestions
The App is designed with the Android look and feel in mind so it fits seemlessly onto your device.
We currently only support the following Netowrk Providers: * Vodafone * Three * Meteor * Tesco In a later releases we will add support for all other Irish providers.
